catch_copy: A game that keeps you motivated to do squats, a fun and highly effective exercise, every day
description:
This game will make you want to do squats.
It’s full of features that make squatting fun and help you keep it up every day.

- What is a squat?
It's a great exercise in which you stand, bend your knees, maintain that position, then straighten your knees and stand up.
Even if you don't bend your knees at a large angle, it puts a lot of strain on the thigh muscles, making it an efficient workout even in a short amount of time.

- What can you do in this game by doing squats?
"Earn money"
"Receive lottery tickets"
"Get discounts on product prices"
"Increase your lottery prize money"
"Find Squat Friends on Squat TV"
"Accelerate your level up"

- Squat Points(sp)
Squatting is an exercise that mainly puts stress on the thighs, and in this game, the amount of stress is expressed as a number called "Squat Points".
"Squat Points" is shortened to "sp" using the first letters.
You can earn Squat Points by squatting, and you can immediately see how much squatting you have done by looking at the number of Squat Points.

- The basic cycle of this game
Squat to earn money, then use it mainly to buy products in the store.
When you buy something, you'll receive medals. Take those to the Exchange Center to level up.
As your level increases, you will earn more money when squatting.
So keep squatting, buy various products, and raise your level even higher!

- The Lottery System
The lottery ticket you get by squatting has six numbers from 1 to 35.
The winning numbers are drawn the next day.
If your ticket matches the result, you'll win some money!
Check your ticket the next day—and don’t forget to squat again to get your next chance!

- Missions
Take on two types of missions: daily and long-term.
Clear missions to earn money and stay motivated!
Daily missions reset every day, so come back and complete them regularly.
Make squatting a daily habit by crushing those missions!

- Recording function
You can record how many squats you have done by day, month, and year, and look back on them at any time.
Daily data can be recorded for up to 1000 days, monthly data for up to 120 months, and yearly data for up to 100 years.

In addition, the total amount of squats, total number of times, total time, total money earned, and total money spent are also recorded, so you can check your activity at any time.

- Is this game for you?
This game is perfect for anyone who:
"Feels they’re not exercising enough compared to how much they eat"
"Wants to sleep better by adding a bit of movement to their routine"
"Knows squats are great but can’t seem to get started"
"Wants to improve their health but struggles to find the time or motivation"

- Play style
Place the Joy-Con™ (L) on the leg strap and wear it on your thigh, and hold the Joy-Con™ (R) in your right hand to play.

notices.text: A leg strap is required to play this game.
